thumb.title: [炎上物件紹介動画。トイレ、二階和室] 戸建て賃貸住宅を地域最安値で流通させたら、価格破壊しすぎて炎上した。
thumb.description: [炎上物件紹介動画。トイレ、二階和室] 戸建て賃貸住宅を地域最安値で流通させたら、価格破壊しすぎて炎上した。 北海道滝川市黄金町東４丁目6-29 の戸建て賃貸住宅です。なんと月家賃３万円！ しかも、10年間住んでいただくと、土地も住宅も入居者さんに譲渡します。マイホームが欲しい方にもオススメ！ https://jmty.jp/hokkaido/est-hou/article-ubdne 音声、「VOICEVOX Nemo」 [Video introducing a controversial property. Toilet, second-floor Japanese-style room]When we listed this detached rental house at the lowest price in the area, it caused a huge controversy due to the extremely low price. This is a detached rental house located at 6-29, Higashi 4-chome, Kogane-cho, Takikawa-shi, Hokkaido. The monthly rent is only 30,000 yen! Furthermore, if you live here for 10 years, we will transfer the land and house to you. Recommended for those who want to own their own home!https://jmty.jp/hokkaido/est-hou/article-ubdneVoice: ‘VOICEVOX Nemo’
